sourcesContent:
import user2 from "../assets/user2.png"
export const testimonials = [
  {
    name: "Sarah Johnson",
    role: "Marketing Director at TechBrand",
    avatar: user2,
    content: "BrandForge AI has revolutionized our ad creation process. We're generating 10x more content in half the time, and the quality is outstanding.",
    rating: 5,
  },
  {
    name: "Michael Chen",
    role: "CEO at GrowthMarketing",
    avatar: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?w=150&h=150&fit=crop&crop=face",
    content: "The AI copywriting feature is incredible. Our conversion rates have increased by 300% since we started using BrandForge AI for our campaigns.",
    rating: 5,
  },
  {
    name: "Emily Rodriguez",
    role: "Brand Manager at InnovateAds",
    avatar: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1438761681033-6461ffad8d80?w=150&h=150&fit=crop&crop=face",
    content: "The campaign optimization tools are game-changing. We've reduced our ad spend by 40% while increasing our reach and engagement.",
    rating: 5,
  },
  {
    name: "David Kim",
    role: "Digital Marketing Lead at ScaleAgency",
    avatar: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507003211169-0a1dd7228f2d?w=150&h=150&fit=crop&crop=face",
    content: "The brand intelligence features help us stay ahead of the competition. We can track trends and adjust our strategy in real-time.",
    rating: 5,
  },
]
